custom-block.comment: Creates the n by n matrix and initializes all the fields with 0.
Fills the input matrix with clones.

block.comment: Remove all clones except the one that was clicked so it's impossible to click two cards.
Deletion of all clones on program startup ("clear" is sent during initialization).
Change costume of a card when clicked.
Determining the position of the next card to be created.
If the clone needs to ensure the correct parity...

block.l: Welcome! This is a magic trick using colored cards! (press space to continue)
First, you will input a number between 3 and 10. Then, a field of cards will be laid out according to the number you picked. (press space to continue)

Both you and the magician will look at the cards for thirty seconds. Then, the magician will look away. While they are looking away, you will click one card to change its color. (press space to continue)
After you clicked a card to change its color, the magician will look at the field of cards again and be able to tell you which one you clicked! (press space to continue)
How many cards (n x n) would you like to use? (between 3 and 10)

block-definition.comment: Then its costume is determined based on the corresponding clones:

block.comment: The ones above it, if the card is on the bottom line.

custom-block.comment: Or the ones to its left, if the card is the last one in a line.

block-definition.comment: LABEL will stamp text on the stage at the given font size. The direction of the text is the direction the sprite is facing, and color will match the pen color.

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

block-definition.comment: Initialization and resetting of important variables used in the program.

block.comment: Counter that keeps track of the number of clones.
